segments.text: Do you have to leave soon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Actually I can stay longer . Dave called to say that there is a beautiful Chinese girl who ’ s going to pick me up at the school gate tonight at ten thirty instead of eight thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s better . So you don ’ t have to rush .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . You know what Dave just said ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said I should put on something very nice , because this girl will be my next target .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He always makes fun of me . He always says things like that . You know the new coming teacher , a Chinese Canadian . He said she would really be my chance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure you have chances everywhere . You ’ re handsome , talkative , and got a sense of humor . You must be very popular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you ’ re kidding . I ’ m not taking it seriously .
segments.speaker: S2
